member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworkConnections
member.summary: The IEnumNetworkConnections interface provides a standard enumerator for network connections. It enumerates active, disconnected, or all network connections within a network. This interface can be obtained from the INetwork interface.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworkConnections.Clone
member.summary: The Clone method creates an enumerator that contains the same enumeration state as the enumerator currently in use.
member.returns: Pointer to new IEnumNetworkConnections interface instance.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworkConnections.Next(System.UInt32,Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnection@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Gets the next specified number of elements in the enumeration sequence.
member.param: Number of elements requested.
Pointer to a list of pointers returned by INetworkConnection.
Pointer to the number of elements supplied. May be NULL if celt is one.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworkConnections.Reset
member.summary: The Reset method resets the enumeration sequence to the beginning.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworkConnections.Skip(System.UInt32)
member.summary: The Skip method skips over the next specified number of elements in the enumeration sequence.
member.param: Number of elements to skip over in the enumeration.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworks
member.summary: Enumerates all networks available on the server. This interface can be obtained from the INetwork interface.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworks.Clone
member.summary: The Clone method creates an enumerator that contains the same enumeration state as the enumerator currently in use.
member.returns: Pointer to new IEnumNetworks interface instance.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworks.Next(System.UInt32,Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Gets the next specified number of elements in the enumeration sequence.
member.param: Number of elements requested.
Pointer to a list of pointers returned by INetworkConnection.
Pointer to the number of elements supplied. May be NULL if celt is one.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworks.Reset
member.summary: The Reset method resets the enumeration sequence to the beginning.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.IEnumNetworks.Skip(System.UInt32)
member.summary: The Skip method skips over the next specified number of elements in the enumeration sequence.
member.param: Number of elements to skip over in the enumeration.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork
member.summary: The INetwork interface represents a network on the local machine. It can also represent a collection of network connections with a similar network signature.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.GetCategory
member.summary: Returns the category of a network.
member.returns: A NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY enumeration value that specifies the category information for the network.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.GetConnectivity
member.summary: Returns the connectivity state of the network.
member.returns: A NLM_CONNECTIVITY enumeration value that contains a bitmask that specifies the connectivity state of this network.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.GetDescription
member.summary: Returns a description string for the network.
member.returns: A string that specifies the text description of the network. This value must be freed using the SysFreeString API.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.GetDomainType
member.summary: Returns the type of network.
member.returns: An NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE enumeration value that specifies the domain type of the network.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.GetName
member.summary: Returns the name of the network.
member.returns: Pointer to the name of the network.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.GetNetworkConnections
member.summary: Returns an enumeration of all network connections for a network. A network can have multiple connections to it from different interfaces or different links from the same interface.
member.returns: An IEnumNetworkConnections interface instance that enumerates the list of local connections to this network.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.GetNetworkId
member.summary: Returns the unique identifier of a network.
member.returns: Pointer to a GUID that specifies the network ID.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.GetTimeCreatedAndConnected(System.UInt32@,System.UInt32@,System.UInt32@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Returns the local date and time when the network was created and connected.
member.param: Pointer to a datetime when the network was created. Specifically, it contains the low DWORD of .
Pointer to a datetime when the network was created. Specifically, it contains the high DWORD of .
Pointer to a datetime when the network was last connected to. Specifically, it contains the low DWORD of .
Pointer to a datetime when the network was last connected to. Specifically, it contains the high DWORD of .

member.name: P:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.IsConnected
member.summary: Specifies if the network has any network connectivity.

member.name: P:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.IsConnectedToInternet
member.summary: Specifies if the network has internet connectivity.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.SetCategory(Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY)
member.summary: Sets the category of a network. Administrative privileges are needed for this API call.
member.param: The new category.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.SetDescription(System.String)
member.summary: Sets a new description for the network.
member.param: Zero-terminated string that contains the description of the network.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetwork.SetName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets or renames the network. This change occurs immediately.
member.param: Zero-terminated string that contains the new name of the network.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnection
member.summary: The INetworkConnection interface represents a single network connection.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnection.GetAdapterId
member.summary: Returns the ID of the network adapter used by this connection. There may multiple connections using the same adapter ID.
member.returns: A GUID that specifies the adapter ID of the TCP/IP interface used by this network connection.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnection.GetConnectionId
member.summary: Returns the Connection ID associated with this network connection.
member.returns: A GUID that specifies the Connection ID associated with this network connection.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnection.GetConnectivity
member.summary: Returns the connectivity state of the network.
member.returns: A NLM_CONNECTIVITY enumeration value that contains a bitmask that specifies the connectivity of this network connection.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnection.GetDomainType
member.summary: Returns the type of network connection.
member.returns: An NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE enumeration value that specifies the domain type of the network.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnection.GetNetwork
member.summary: Returns the associated network for the connection.
member.returns: An INetwork interface instance that specifies the network associated with the connection.

member.name: P:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnection.IsConnected
member.summary: Specifies if the associated network connection has any network connectivity.

member.name: P:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnection.IsConnectedToInternet
member.summary: Specifies if the associated network connection has internet connectivity.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnectionCost
member.summary: Use this interface to query current network cost and data plan status associated with a connection.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnectionCost.GetCost
member.summary: Retrieves the network cost associated with a connection.
member.returns: A DWORD value that represents the network cost of the connection. The lowest 16 bits represent the cost level and the highest 16 bits represent the cost flags. Possible values are defined by the enumeration.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkConnectionCost.GetDataPlanStatus
member.summary: Gets the data plan status.
member.returns: An NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS structure that describes the status of the data plan associated with the connection. The caller supplies the memory of this structure.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkCostManager
member.summary: Use this interface to query for machine-wide cost and data plan status information associated with either a connection used for machine-wide Internet connectivity, or the first-hop of routing to a specific destination on a connection. Additionally, this interface enables applications to specify destination IP addresses to receive cost or data plan status change notifications for.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkCostManager.GetCost(Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST@,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: The GetCost method retrieves the current cost of either a machine-wide internet connection, or the first-hop of routing to a specific destination on a connection. If destIPaddr is NULL, this method instead returns the cost of the network used for machine-wide Internet connectivity.
member.param: A DWORD value that indicates the cost of the connection. The lowest 16 bits represent the cost level, and the highest 16 bits represent the flags. Possible values are defined by the enumeration.
An structure containing the destination IPv4/IPv6 address. If NULL, this method will instead return the cost associated with the preferred connection used for machine Internet connectivity.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkCostManager.GetDataPlanStatus(Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS@,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: The GetDataPlanStatus retrieves the data plan status for either a machine-wide internet connection , or the first-hop of routing to a specific destination on a connection. If an IPv4/IPv6 address is not specified, this method returns the data plan status of the connection used for machine-wide Internet connectivity.
member.param: Pointer to an NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS structure that describes the data plan status associated with a connection used to route to a destination. If destIPAddr specifies a tunnel address, the first available data plan status in the interface stack is returned.
An structure containing the destination IPv4/IPv6 or tunnel address. If NULL, this method returns the cost associated with the preferred connection used for machine Internet connectivity.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkCostManager.SetDestinationAddresses(System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,System.Boolean)
member.summary: The SetDestinationAddresses method registers specified destination IPv4/IPv6 addresses to receive cost or data plan status change notifications.
member.param: The number of destination IPv4/IPv6 addresses in the list.
A structure containing a list of destination IPv4/IPv6 addresses to register for cost or data plan status change notification.
If true, pDestIPAddrList will be appended to the existing address list; otherwise the existing list will be overwritten.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager
member.summary: The INetworkListManager interface provides a set of methods to perform network list management functions.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager.ClearSimulatedProfileInfo
member.summary: Clears the connection profile values previously applied to the internet connection profile by SetSimulatedProfileInfo. The next internet connection query, via GetInternetConnectionProfile, will use system information.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager.GetConnectivity
member.summary: Returns the connectivity state of all the networks on a machine.
member.returns: An NLM_CONNECTIVITY enumeration value that contains a bitmask that specifies the network connectivity of this machine.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager.GetNetwork(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves a network based on a supplied Network ID.
member.param: GUID that specifies the network ID.
member.returns: The INetwork interface instance for this network.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager.GetNetworkConnection(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves a network based on a supplied Network Connection ID.
member.param: A GUID that specifies the Network Connection ID.
member.returns: A INetworkConnection object associated with the supplied gdNetworkConnectionId.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager.GetNetworkConnections
member.summary: Gets an enumerator that contains a complete list of the network connections that have been made.
member.returns: An IEnumNetworkConnections interface instance that enumerates all network connections on the machine.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager.GetNetworks(Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_ENUM_NETWORK)
member.summary: Retrieves networks based on the supplied Network IDs.
member.param: NLM_ENUM_NETWORK enumeration value that specifies the flags for the network (specifically, connected or not connected).
member.returns: An IEnumNetworks interface instance that contains the enumerator for the list of available networks.

member.name: P:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager.IsConnected
member.summary: Specifies if the local machine has network connectivity.

member.name: P:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager.IsConnectedToInternet
member.summary: Specifies if the machine has Internet connectivity.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.INetworkListManager.SetSimulatedProfileInfo(Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_SIMULATED_PROFILE_INFO@)
member.summary:
Applies a specific set of connection profile values to the internet connection profile in support of the simulation of specific metered internet connection conditions.
The simulation only applies in an RDP Child Session and does not affect the primary user session. The simulated internet connection profile is returned via the Windows Runtime API GetInternetConnectionProfile.
member.param: Specific connection profile values to simulate on the current internet connection profile when calling GetInternetConnectionProfile from an RDP Child Session

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NetworkListManager
member.summary: Provides a set of methods to perform network list management functions.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST
member.summary: The enumeration specifies a set of cost levels and cost flags supported in Windows 8 Cost APIs.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST.NLM_CONNECTION_COST_UNKNOWN
member.summary: The cost is unknown.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST.NLM_CONNECTION_COST_UNRESTRICTED
member.summary: The connection is unlimited and is considered to be unrestricted of usage charges and capacity constraints.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST.NLM_CONNECTION_COST_FIXED
member.summary: The use of this connection is unrestricted up to a specific data transfer limit.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST.NLM_CONNECTION_COST_VARIABLE
member.summary: This connection is regulated on a per byte basis.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST.NLM_CONNECTION_COST_OVERDATALIMIT
member.summary: The connection is currently in an OverDataLimit state as it has exceeded the carrier specified data transfer limit.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST.NLM_CONNECTION_COST_CONGESTED
member.summary: The network is experiencing high traffic load and is congested.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST.NLM_CONNECTION_COST_ROAMING
member.summary: The connection is roaming outside the network and affiliates of the home provider.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_COST.NLM_CONNECTION_COST_APPROACHINGDATALIMIT
member.summary: The connection is approaching the data limit specified by the carrier.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_PROPERTY_CHANGE
member.summary: The NLM_CONNECTION PROPERTY_CHANGE enumeration is a set of flags that define changes made to the properties of a network connection.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTION_PROPERTY_CHANGE.NLM_CONNECTION_PROPERTY_CHANGE_AUTHENTICATION
member.summary: The Authentication (Domain Type) of this Network Connection has changed.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY
member.summary: The NLM_Connectivity enumeration is a set of flags that provide notification whenever connectivity related parameters have changed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY.NLM_CONNECTIVITY_DISCONNECTED
member.summary: The underlying network interfaces have no connectivity to any network.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY.NLM_CONNECTIVITY_IPV4_NOTRAFFIC
member.summary: There is connectivity to a network, but the service cannot detect any IPv4 Network Traffic.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY.NLM_CONNECTIVITY_IPV6_NOTRAFFIC
member.summary: There is connectivity to a network, but the service cannot detect any IPv6 Network Traffic.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY.NLM_CONNECTIVITY_IPV4_SUBNET
member.summary: There is connectivity to the local subnet using the IPv4 protocol.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY.NLM_CONNECTIVITY_IPV4_LOCALNETWORK
member.summary: There is connectivity to a routed network using the IPv4 protocol.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY.NLM_CONNECTIVITY_IPV4_INTERNET
member.summary: There is connectivity to the Internet using the IPv4 protocol.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY.NLM_CONNECTIVITY_IPV6_SUBNET
member.summary: There is connectivity to the local subnet using the IPv6 protocol.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY.NLM_CONNECTIVITY_IPV6_LOCALNETWORK
member.summary: There is connectivity to a local network using the IPv6 protocol.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_CONNECTIVITY.NLM_CONNECTIVITY_IPV6_INTERNET
member.summary: There is connectivity to the Internet using the IPv6 protocol.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS
member.summary: The NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS structure stores the current data plan status information supplied by the carrier.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.DataLimitInMegabytes
member.summary: The data plan usage limit expressed in megabytes. If this value is not supplied, a default value of NLM_UNKNOWN_DATAPLAN_STATUS is set.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.InboundBandwidthInKbps
member.summary: The maximum inbound connection bandwidth expressed in kbps. If this value is not supplied, a default value of NLM_UNKNOWN_DATAPLAN_STATUS is set.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.InterfaceGuid
member.summary: The unique ID of the interface associated with the data plan. This GUID is determined by the system when a data plan is first used by a system connection.

member.name: P:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.IsDefined
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the data plan status values are default values, or provided by the MNO.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.MaxTransferSizeInMegabytes
member.summary: The maximum suggested transfer size for this network expressed in megabytes. If this value is not supplied, a default value of NLM_UNKNOWN_DATAPLAN_STATUS is set.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.NextBillingCycle
member.summary: The start time of the next billing cycle. If this value is not supplied, a default value of '0' is set.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.OutboundBandwidthInKbps
member.summary: The maximum outbound connection bandwidth expressed in kbps. If this value is not supplied, a default value of NLM_UNKNOWN_DATAPLAN_STATUS is set.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.Reserved
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.UsageData
member.summary:
An NLM_USAGE_DATA structure containing current data usage value expressed in megabytes, as well as the system time at the moment this value was last synced.
If this value is not supplied, NLM_USAGE_DATA will indicate NLM_UNKNOWN_DATAPLAN_STATUS for UsageInMegabytes and a value of '0' will be set for LastSyncTime.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE
member.summary: The NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE enumeration is a set of flags that specify the domain type of a network.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE.NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE_NON_DOMAIN_NETWORK
member.summary: The Network is not an Active Directory Network.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE.NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE_DOMAIN_NETWORK
member.summary: The Network is an Active Directory Network, but this machine is not authenticated against it.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE.NLM_DOMAIN_TYPE_DOMAIN_AUTHENTICATED
member.summary: The Network is an Active Directory Network, and this machine is authenticated against it.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_ENUM_NETWORK
member.summary: The NLM_ENUM_NETWORK enumeration contains a set of flags that specify what types of networks are enumerated.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_ENUM_NETWORK.NLM_ENUM_NETWORK_CONNECTED
member.summary: Returns connected networks

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_ENUM_NETWORK.NLM_ENUM_NETWORK_DISCONNECTED
member.summary: Returns disconnected networks

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_ENUM_NETWORK.NLM_ENUM_NETWORK_ALL
member.summary: Returns connected and disconnected networks

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY
member.summary: The NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY enumeration is a set of flags that specify the category type of a network.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY.NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY_PUBLIC
member.summary: The network is a public (untrusted) network.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY.NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY_PRIVATE
member.summary: The network is a private (trusted) network.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY.NLM_NETWORK_CATEGORY_DOMAIN_AUTHENTICATED
member.summary: The network is authenticated against an Active Directory domain.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE
member.summary: The NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE enumeration is a set of flags that define changes made to the properties of a network.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE_CATEGORY_VALUE
member.summary: The category of the network has changed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE_CONNECTION
member.summary: A connection to this network has been added or removed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: The description of the network has changed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE_ICON
member.summary: The icon of the network has changed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE.NLM_NETWORK_PROPERTY_CHANGE_NAME
member.summary: The name of the network has changed.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_SIMULATED_PROFILE_INFO
member.summary: Used to specify values that are used by SetSimulatedProfileInfo to override current internet connection profile values in an RDP Child Session to support the simulation of specific metered internet connection conditions.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_SIMULATED_PROFILE_INFO.cost
member.summary: The network cost.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_SIMULATED_PROFILE_INFO.DataLimitInMegabytes
member.summary: The data limit of the plan.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_SIMULATED_PROFILE_INFO.ProfileName
member.summary: Name for the simulated profile.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_SIMULATED_PROFILE_INFO.UsageInMegabytes
member.summary: The data usage.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_SOCKADDR
member.summary: The structure contains the IPv4/IPv6 destination address.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_SOCKADDR.data
member.summary: An IPv4/IPv6 destination address.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_SOCKADDR.FromIPAddress(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.summary: Creates a from an instance.
member.param: The IP address to encapsulate.
member.returns: A instance with its data field set to either the IPv4 or IPv6 address supplied by .

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_USAGE_DATA
member.summary: The NLM_USAGE_DATA structure stores information that indicates the data usage of a plan.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_USAGE_DATA.LastSyncTime
member.summary: The timestamp of last time synced with carriers about the data usage stored in this structure.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.NetListMgr.NLM_USAGE_DATA.UsageInMegabytes
member.summary: The data usage of a plan, represented in megabytes.
